name: Show_Backbone_switch_Details
action: <*ALLOWATTRIBUTES(Backbone Switch Details,Cluster_Name_Backbone,Default Switch,Default Crossover Cable,Power Cord Type,PDU Power Cable Req for HP/ Huawei Switch,Accessories of Backbone Switch,Tree A 2m cable (0-1000),Tree A 5m cable (0-1000),Tree A 10m cable (0-1000),Tree A 20m cable (0-1000),Tree B 2m cable (0-1000),Tree B 5m cable (0-1000),Tree B 10m cable (0-1000),Tree B 20m cable (0-1000))*><*SETREQUIRED(Backbone Switch Details,Cluster_Name_Backbone,Default Switch,Default Crossover Cable,Power Cord Type,PDU Power Cable Req for HP/ Huawei Switch,Accessories of Backbone Switch,Tree A 2m cable (0-1000),Tree A 5m cable (0-1000),Tree A 10m cable (0-1000),Tree A 20m cable (0-1000),Tree B 2m cable (0-1000),Tree B 5m cable (0-1000),Tree B 10m cable (0-1000),Tree B 20m cable (0-1000))*><*xDisallowallValuesExcept(Cluster_Name_Backbone:<* LIST ( SELECT AttValue FROM ClusterAttValues WHERE CAST (AttValueCode AS float) <= '<*CTX( Container(List of Locations/Clusters/Network Groups).Rows.GetCount )*>' ) *>)*>
